name: fusion-hardening
description: Deep knowledge skill for analyzing and hardening the Fusion Optimizer (tool_enabled) execution pipeline. Covers strategic planning, 8 plan rewrite passes, tactical execution, 3-tier error recovery, 3 orchestrators, 6 enterprise safeguards, execution trace analysis, plan quality diagnostics, and prompt engineering guidance.
author: Claude + User
use_cases: Analyze execution traces from tool_enabled profile sessions
Diagnose plan quality issues in strategic meta-plans
Identify which enterprise safeguards fired during execution
Detect anti-patterns in generated plans (missing temporal context, unnecessary phases, hallucinated arguments)
Evaluate fast-path vs slow-path decision correctness
Trace self-correction chains and quantify token overhead
Understand the 8 plan rewrite passes and their trigger conditions
Debug proactive re-planning for mixed prompt+tool plans
Verify context distillation is protecting the LLM context window
Add new plan rewrite passes or correction strategies
Predict expected plan structure for a given query type
Compare actual execution trace against expected behavior
Identify root causes of excessive token usage in Fusion Optimizer queries
